unittitle_ssm: Newtown, Queens County public road bond
abstract_ssm: The collection consists of an 1869 bond issued by the Town of Newtown in Queens County for the construction and maintenance of a public road.  The bond is dated December 1, 1869.
subject_ssm: Roads -- New York (State) -- Queens County -- Design and construction
